# Change Log
All notable changes to the "latex-formatter" extension will be documented in this file.

## 1.0.5 - 2017-05-17
### Changed
- Filenames with spaces are now allowed

## 1.0.4 - 2017-05-11
### Added
- macOs - Support

## 1.0.3 - 2017-04-13
### Changed
- fixed typos in readme

## 1.0.2 - 2017-04-12
### Added
- Icon
- Windows support
- Installation guide in Readme

## 1.0.1 - 2017-04-10
### Added
- GIF with Example
### Changed
- Readme

## 1.0.0 - 2017-04-10
### Added
- First release
